articles.author: Leslie Josephs
articles.title: American Airlines pilots approve sweetened labor deal with big raises - CNBC
articles.description: American follows Delta in sealing a labor deal with its pilots this year.
articles.content:
American Airlines pilots approved a sweetened labor deal, making the carrier the second major U.S. airline to seal a new contract with its highest-paid work group.
The more than 15,000 pilots at Ame… [+1073 chars]

articles.author: Alexandre Tanzi
articles.title: American Workers Want Almost $79000 Salary to Start a New Job - Bloomberg
articles.description: The wage floor for American workers climbed to a record high close to $79,000, according to a Federal Reserve Bank of New York survey released Monday that also found pay demands among women are rising twice as fast as for men.

articles.title: A Californian was killed after an argument over a Pride flag hanging outside her clothing store, deputies say - CNN
articles.description: A Southern California clothing store owner was shot and killed after an argument about a rainbow Pride flag hanging outside her business, police said, as the LGBTQ+ community continues to face violence and threats across America.

articles.title: Health officials warn Americans of deadly flesh-eating bacteria - NewsNation Now
articles.description: As cases of this rare flesh-eating bacteria go up, so does concern from health officials.
articles.content: MIAMI (NewsNation) Health officials are sounding the alarm over a rise in cases of a rare flesh-eating bacteria. So far this year, at least a dozen people have died from the infection across the U.S.… [+1962 chars]
